content: fancy feast fish materials size g f and e hook 3 colors of ww yarn i used red heart and caron simply soft body 6 single_crochet in ring i used the magic_ring method any method is fine though round 1 2sc in each single_crochet 12sc round 2 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next around 18 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 4 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 6 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 7 dec2sc single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 8 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 9 dec2sc single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 10 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet round 11 & 12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet row 13 chain 1 holding both sides together single_crochet across to close tail turn row 14 chain 4 2 treble_crochet in same space 3 treble_crochet in each single_crochet across turn row 15 change color and to f hook chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space 3 double_crochet in each treble_crochet across turn row 16 change color and to e hook chain 1 2 single_crochet in same space 3 single_crochet in each double_crochet across finish off fins using size g hook attach yarn and 6 single_crochet in one of the chain-5 loops row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across 6 single_crochet turn row 2 change color & to f hook chain 4 2 treble_crochet in same space 3 treble_crochet in each single_crochet across turn row 3 change color & to e hook chain 1 3 single_crochet in same space 4 single_crochet in each treble_crochet across finish off repeat for other side fin eyes make 2 using size g hook 6 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch to first single_crochet chain 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around finish off finishing sew eyes to the head of the fish glue google eyes to the center of crochet eyes weave in all ends don t forget stuff with stuffing before you close him up around round 7 or 8 i also added a jingle bell in there pattern written by gnathalie2
